content: pattern notes this throw is worked flat from the lower right corner to the upper left corner first increasing to the desired length then decreasing to form a square a border round is then crocheted around the entire piece premier® yarns puzzle® shimmer 98% acrylic 2% metalized polyester 5 29oz/150g 246yds/225m c1 2118-07 maze shimmer 3 balls c2 2118-08 checkers shimmer 3 balls c3 2118-01 jacks shimmer 3 balls hook us size k/10 5 6 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle skills/techniques used in this pattern chain double and extended double_crochet stitches changing colors working row in a diagonal
